about_the_game:
MEET THE CONTENDERS!




As a player, you take on the role of a pilot, and compete in a futuristic gameshow that pits mind-controlled robots - known as Gladiators - against each other in adrenaline-fueled matches, televised within the extended Contenders universe.

MOVE IN STYLE

Attack and evade enemies with acrobatic maneuvers.

  • Wallrun: Run along walls and add a vertical dimension to your game.
  • Grinding: Grind on rails that allow for swift and stylish travel across the arena.
  • Slide: Slide through gaps to clear danger or launch surprise attacks.



CHOOSE YOUR GLADIATOR

Choose from one of three Gladiators! Each Gladiator is unique and sponsored by one of the in-universe megacorporations.

ARENA COMBAT

  • Unique Gladiator frames : Choose from one of three gladiator frames, each with their unique abilities and weapons.
  • Diverse Abilities: Gladiators can utilize a variety of abilities to gain the upper hand in combat.
  • Loadouts: Create loadouts by mixing and matching abilities and weapons, allowing for diverse combat strategies.



CUSTOMIZATION

  • Unique In-Game Items: Receive unique in-game items by completing challenges or browse the Item Shop for extras.
  • Liveries: Change the look of your Gladiator with various skins that allow for unique flair.
  • Armor: Customize your Gladiator with a range of full body armors to change their appearance and showcase your achievements.
  • Accessories: Customize you Gladiator with a wide-range of accessories

REWARDS & CHALLENGES

  • Regular Challenges: Participate in online matches to complete in challenges and earn unique rewards that enhance your Gladiator's style.
  • Unique Rewards: Unlock exclusive rewards such as skins, banners, avatars, and victory poses through the completion of challenges
  • Seasonal Rewards: Each season will feature a new assortment of rewards that can be earned through gameplay progression and challenges.

Please note that the game is still in development and features are subject to change.
detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD COMMUNITY


About the Game

MEET THE CONTENDERS!




As a player, you take on the role of a pilot, and compete in a futuristic gameshow that pits mind-controlled robots - known as Gladiators - against each other in adrenaline-fueled matches, televised within the extended Contenders universe.

MOVE IN STYLE

Attack and evade enemies with acrobatic maneuvers.

  • Wallrun: Run along walls and add a vertical dimension to your game.
  • Grinding: Grind on rails that allow for swift and stylish travel across the arena.
  • Slide: Slide through gaps to clear danger or launch surprise attacks.



CHOOSE YOUR GLADIATOR

Choose from one of three Gladiators! Each Gladiator is unique and sponsored by one of the in-universe megacorporations.

ARENA COMBAT

  • Unique Gladiator frames : Choose from one of three gladiator frames, each with their unique abilities and weapons.
  • Diverse Abilities: Gladiators can utilize a variety of abilities to gain the upper hand in combat.
  • Loadouts: Create loadouts by mixing and matching abilities and weapons, allowing for diverse combat strategies.



CUSTOMIZATION

  • Unique In-Game Items: Receive unique in-game items by completing challenges or browse the Item Shop for extras.
  • Liveries: Change the look of your Gladiator with various skins that allow for unique flair.
  • Armor: Customize your Gladiator with a range of full body armors to change their appearance and showcase your achievements.
  • Accessories: Customize you Gladiator with a wide-range of accessories

REWARDS & CHALLENGES

  • Regular Challenges: Participate in online matches to complete in challenges and earn unique rewards that enhance your Gladiator's style.
  • Unique Rewards: Unlock exclusive rewards such as skins, banners, avatars, and victory poses through the completion of challenges
  • Seasonal Rewards: Each season will feature a new assortment of rewards that can be earned through gameplay progression and challenges.

Please note that the game is still in development and features are subject to change.

name: Contenders: Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 & above
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1400 / Intel Core i3-7400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 & above
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X / Intel Core i5-9600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX 2070 Super / AMD Radeon 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Contenders: Arena is an exhilarating 3v3 shooter that takes you into a world of fast-paced action, strategic gameplay, and thrilling competition. Become the skilled pilot of a new kind of gladiator and prepare to engage in intense battles unlike anything you've experienced before!
